Subject: Urgent: Your Netflix Account Is Suspended

Dear Valued Member,

We’ve detected unusual activity on your Netflix account (User: john.doe@email.com). To prevent unauthorized access, we’ve temporarily suspended your account. Please verify your billing information and recent login activity immediately.

Click here to resolve this issue: https://netflix-security-verification[.]com

Failure to act within 24 hours will result in permanent account termination. If you did not initiate this request, contact our support team at +1-800-555-0199 (24/7).

Thank you,
Netflix Security Team

---
Note: This is an automated message. Do not reply directly to this email.

Subject: Invoice #INV-9087 Overdue – Immediate Action Required

Hello Accounts Department,

Our records show that Invoice #INV-9087 (Amount Due: $1,245.50) remains unpaid. This payment was due on 15th October 2023. Failure to settle this balance may result in late fees or service disruption.

View the invoice here: https://secure-invoice-portal[.]com/download

If you’ve already paid, disregard this notice. For questions, email billing@invoice-support[.]net or call +44-20-7946-0811.

Best regards,
Financial Operations Team
ACME Corp

---
Confidentiality Notice: This email may contain privileged information.

Subject: You’ve Won a $500 Amazon Gift Card!

CONGRATULATIONS, WINNER!

You’ve been selected in our Summer Rewards Program! Claim your $500 Amazon gift card by completing these steps:
1. Click here: https://amazon-rewards[.]com/claim
2. Enter promo code: SUMMER500
3. Verify your email and phone number.

Offer expires in 12 hours. This is a limited-time promotion sponsored by Amazon Prime.

Questions? Contact support@amazon-rewards[.]com

This is a promotional email. Unsubscribe here: https://amazon-rewards[.]com/unsub

Subject: IT Alert: Critical Security Update Required

ATTENTION EMPLOYEE,

Your workstation (ID: WS-5873) is missing a mandatory security patch. Install the update within 2 hours to avoid network disconnection.

Download the patch here: https://company-updates[.]net/security-patch.exe

Do NOT delay—this update addresses a severe vulnerability (CVE-2023-28475) actively exploited by hackers. Contact the IT Helpdesk at helpdesk@company-updates[.]net for assistance.

Regards,
Corporate IT Department

---
This is an automated system alert. Replies are not monitored.

Subject: FedEx Delivery Failed – Reschedule Required

Dear Customer,
